content: यथावत् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Duly, fitly, properly, rightly; <ab>oft.</ab> with the force of an adjective; अध्यपिपद्गाधिसुतो यथावत् <ls>Bk. 2. 21</ls>; लिपेर्यथावदग्रहणेन <ls>R. 3. 28.</ls> {@--2@} According to rule or precept, as enjoined by rules; ततो यथावद्विहिताध्वराय <ls>R. 5. 19</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 1</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">8. 214.</ls> {@--3@} Exactly, truly.
